name: KatyISDSchoolCalendar
0:
”Alexa, ask Katy Independent School District Calendar when is the next day off?”
”Alexa, ask Katy Independent School District Calendar do the kids have school tommorow”
”Alexa, ask Katy Independent School District Calendar when do the kids have off in March?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: katy independent school district calendar
des: This skill is for residents in the Katy Independent School District. Ask Alexa about questions about the school calendar. You can ask Alexa if the kids have school tomorrow, next week, or if there is school on a specific date. Ask Alexa to find out which days the kids are off in a particular month. You can even ask Alexa to tell when is the next day off, or when is the first or last day of school.This skill is for residents in the Katy Independent School District. Ask Alexa about questions about the school calendar. You can ask Alexa if the kids have school tomorrow, next week, or if there is school on a specific date. Ask Alexa to find out which days the kids are off in a particular month. You can even ask Alexa to tell when is the next day off, or when is the first or last day of school.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
